staxel.village.dialogue.Barkeep.line:100: Oh, don't think I've seen you around here before!
New in town eh?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Good to see you ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
What can I do for you today?
Let's chat!
Any rumours?
I'm thirsty.
Nothing really.
I'd like to buy some of your secret ingredient.
I'm hungry.
I'm sure you'll fit right in.
Here, this is on the house!
Could we have a chat, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Think of it as our welcome to the town.
I hope to see you around here every now and again.
By the way... and perhaps this might seem like an odd question but...
Is there a particular type of animal you like?
Cats are super cute!
Dogs are the coolest!
Oh! How lucky for you!
A merchant came by the other day whose aunt's friend's sister's son had a litter!
If you come back once you're done with ^c:1486b0;{0-tut_name}^c:pop;, I might just have one for you!
Good luck!
Hope to see you around!
Hmm... doesn't look like there's much going on right now.
I haven't heard any rumours today.
Supposedly ^c:1486b0;{0-quest_giver_0}^c:pop; is having a little trouble.
Seems things aren't perfect for ^c:1486b0;{0-quest_giver_1}^c:pop; either.
^c:1486b0;{0-quest_giver_2}^c:pop; might appreciate some help too.
What will you have?
A Mug o' Sap! ({0-currency}{1-sap})
A cup of Joe! ({0-currency}{1-coffee}).
Never mind.
One ^c:d03e37;Mug o' Sap^c:pop; coming right up!
Ah well, another time maybe?
Hmm... doesn't look like you can afford that.
Come back when you have some cash!
Good day ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Is that a note for me?
Hmm... so ^c:1486b0;{0-tut_name}^c:pop; sent you to fetch her some more sap eh?
She drinks far too much of the stuff...
Hmm...
Tell you what, run a little errand for me and I'll see what I can do.
Nothing major or anything...
Just hand that over to ^c:1486b0;{0-shop_name}^c:pop; at the ^c:1486b0;general store^c:pop; and he'll know what I need.
It's an order I've been waiting on for just under a week.
As you can probably see, I've just been too busy to leave the place unattended...
Still don't have my order eh?
^c:1486b0;{0-shop_name}^c:pop; has been holding on to it for me for almost a week.
Go fetch it for me as soon as you can!
Ah! This overpowering aroma!
You have my parcel!
I can't express just how much I've been looking forward to this!
The entrancing fragrance... the incomparable flavours...
Hm? You want to know what's in the package?
It's a special type of fermented fish!
There's only a few islands out there that produce it so it's pretty hard to come by!
I like to tease ^c:1486b0;{0-shop_name}^c:pop; a little by having it sent to the store first...
But enough about that! I imagine you're eager to get back to your pet!
Hm? Oh! I didn't tell you?
I've already sent your pet over to ^c:1486b0;{0-tut_name}^c:pop;!
That there is just a letter with some advice for ^c:1486b0;{0-tut_name}^c:pop;.
Make sure you give it to her for me!
Don't worry about the sap she sent you for - I've already dealt with that.
You should hurry on back to meet your new companion!
Remember - you're welcome here any time!
It usually gets a bit livelier in the evenings so that might be a nice time to stop by!
You probably shouldn't stay out too late though!
It's good to get back to your bed and sleep the night away.
Mmm, there have been quite a few concerning mutterings recently...
It's hard to give them credence, but with so many reports you start to wonder...
The rumour goes that some ancient creature has taken up residence in the forest nearby.
I'd go check it out myself, but then who would watch this place?
Looking for information on ^c:1486b0;Rosemary's^c:pop; childhood, eh?
I've heard my fair share of rumours and there definitely was something up with that whole thing.
Don't think even lonely rabbits usually die quite that fast...but I could be wrong there.
I'm a tavern keeper, not a farmer!
But you know who would know something? ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; would remember.
The man's got a memory a mnemonist would envy!
Oh, sorry. That's my word of the day!
A rabbit...? We don't serve rabbit here...
Oh! You meant for ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop;?
Well why didn't you say so sooner?
Normally I'd tell you I have a friend whose aunt's son's babysitter's barber had one for sale...
But not at the moment, I'm afraid.
Although...
I did see a rather lonely looking rabbit out in the woodlands...
Could be worth going to check it out...
Don't forget to take ^c:d03e37;carrots^c:pop; with you! It might be worth giving it a few!
Good timing as always, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Now that our ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop; supply is no longer under threat, I've had time to worry about other things.
My brother and I...long ago, we had a dream. A dream that never quite came to fruition...
But the other day, I was digging through some old boxes when I came across a certain recipe.
Just a few notes he'd jotted down in the margin of a far more important document.
It reminds me though...of what we'd planned so many years ago. I think it might be time to try again!
There's one small issue though, and it's one I can't deal with while minding the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;.
We're missing some critical equipment!
This is a description of the machine we need, right down to the exact specifications.
Could you go talk to the ^c:1486b0;Murmurs^c:pop; around the ^c:1486b0;square^c:pop; and see if they can find one?
It would be a huge help!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! What brings you around these parts?
Truth is, I was just thinking about you. Not in a bad way though, mind!
See, I've been thinking that maybe I could consider teaching you my secret ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop; recipe...
But only if you can do something for me in return!
See, I'm having some trouble making the stuff myself at the moment...
Years ago, we had ^c:d03e37;apiaries^c:pop; all over the island and I had a nice, steady supply of ^c:d03e37;honey^c:pop;.
Eventually they disappeared and no one bothered to take over the work, but my stockpile held out.
But now it's starting to run low... I'm not sure how much more ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop; I can make!
I'm a bit too old to take up beekeeping again at this point...
I'd hate to import the low-quality stuff from other islands too...
Bring me some of your own ^c:d03e37;honey^c:pop;, two ^c:d03e37;wildberries^c:pop;, and a three ^c:d03e37;raw wood^c:pop; and we'll talk more!
How about you set up your own ^c:d03e37;apiary^c:pop;?
You just need to buy the ^c:d03e37;apiary^c:pop; itself and then find a ^c:d03e37;queen bee^c:pop;!
Bring me some of your own ^c:d03e37;honey^c:pop;, two ^c:d03e37;wildberries^c:pop;, and a three ^c:d03e37;raw wood^c:pop; and we'll talk more!
You need to set up an ^c:d03e37;apiary^c:pop; and get it working.
Then bring me some of your own ^c:d03e37;honey^c:pop;, two ^c:d03e37;wildberries^c:pop;, and three ^c:d03e37;raw wood^c:pop; and we'll talk more!
I can smell the ^c:d03e37;honey^c:pop; already, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
And it's the island's speciality too! Nowhere else has bees quite like ours!
Now, let me just deal with these. Look the other way please!
Here it is! The ^c:d03e37;secret ingredient^c:pop; for making ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;!
Now if you just mix up that recipe, you can make your own ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop; whenever you want!
Bear in mind that I'm not going to teach you how to make the ^c:d03e37;secret ingredient^c:pop; though...
You'll have to come to me whenever you want to buy that!
This is just a little something extra as thanks for keeping me in business!
I don't know what ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; would've done if we'd run out of ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;...
Sure thing!
I gave you a description of the machine needed.
If you could get one from a ^c:1486b0;Murmur^c:pop; that would be fantastic!
Oh! Perfect! This is exactly what I was looking for!
These were a lot scarcer back in my day...
Now we just need to...
Oh...
How how foolish of me! What good is a ^c:d03e37;coffee brewer^c:pop; without ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop;?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, would you mind running back to that  ^c:1486b0;square^c:pop; for me?
I'm sure one of the ^c:1486b0;Murmurs^c:pop; sells ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop;, right?
Actually...what if we could convince them to import ^c:d03e37;coffee plant seeds^c:pop; instead?
That way we could grow the ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop; ourselves! Or yourself I suppose!
Yes, let's do that instead!
Let me know when you have some ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop; in hand!
You're probably going to want to grow them from ^c:d03e37;coffee plant seeds^c:pop;.
Talk to the ^c:1486b0;Murmurs^c:pop; first to see if you can get them imported.
What's that I can smell, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
Could those be the finest of ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop;?
But these are amazing! I've never seen such perfect specimens! You grew them yourself?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I suspect this is going to be the beginning of a wonderful partnership!
Now I can hardly take these free of charge...
I hope this will be sufficient to pay for an initial shipment of the ^c:d03e37;coffee beans^c:pop;.
Come by any time if you want to try the end product!
One hot fresh ^c:d03e37;Coffee^c:pop;, here you go!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I think it's time I tell you about the plan that never was.
See, when I first came to the island, it wasn't to set up a ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;...
Our dream was to build a classy establishment, serving trendy meals alongside our ^c:d03e37;sap^c:pop;.
But that didn't exactly do well out here...
If it wasn't for ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;, even the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop; would probably have gone under by now!
But it's time to change that. We're going to expand the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;!
This should be everything you need to get started!
I hope I can count on you to help me see this through to the end!
It's so beautiful I could almost cry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
Now there's just one little problem we need to sort out and we can open the kitchens!
See, I can't manage a kitchen, look after the counter, and deliver orders all by myself...
I need you to help my find someone who can work here part-time...
Could you run around the villagers and see if any of them is willing?
Maybe start with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop; since they're here most of the time anyway!
Just a little more and we'll finally be able to open up our kitchens!
All you need to do is expand the ^c:1486b0;tavern^c:pop;!
Did you speak with ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;?
One of them might be willing to work here part-time.
So a no on both counts, eh?
Well that does put us in a bit of a bind...
How about you? Would you be interested in doing a bit of part-time work?
Not every day, mind. Just when necessary.
I'd love to!
Maybe some other time.
I'm happy to hear you're so enthusiastic about the position!
We even already have two orders waiting!
This is the first order. Description's on the item itself.
You just need to give it to them directly!
Ah, I understand. Do let me know if you change your mind.
Ah, this again?
That ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; really does get a bit too riled up...
But I suppose I won't say no to a free ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop;!
You just need to hand over the order to the person the description best fits.
Just give it to them directly!
You delivered to the wrong person?
You need to pay better attention to the description, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! What a nice surprise!
You delivered to the wrong person?
You can assure ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; that I'm well stocked on ^c:1486b0;sap^c:pop;.
You need to pay better attention to the description, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Always have to keep the reserves up to cope with ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;, you know?
You delivered to the wrong person?
You need to pay better attention to the description, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
You managed to deliver the first order? Good work!
We need to get these fulfilled as soon as possible so I won't waste any time.
You know the drill now, let's get this one delivered!
No problems I take it? Very good! Two down, only one to go.
You're doing great so far! There's a nice bonus waiting!
Ahh...that's a relief! No more orders left today.
You performed fantastically, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Here's your payment for today, plus a little bonus for doing such a great job.
I'm not sure how to express my thanks for all you've done...
My dream...my brother's dream...it's finally becoming a reality.
Together, we'll make this place a classy restaurant yet!
^c:1486b0;Farm Fan's^c:pop; birthday gift?
Oh! I completely forgot.
But...I know exactly what she would want from me anyway...
I'm not sure what anyone else got her, but I know she's going to like mine best!
What'll it be?
Baked Potato with Cheese({0-currency}{1-potato}).
Mushroom Risotto ({0-currency}{1-risotto})
Never mind.
^c:d03e37;Baked Potato with Cheese^c:pop;, my favourite! Here you go!
Ah, one of our specialties.
